alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 9:44PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Crockett, southeastern Dyer, southwestern Gibson and northeastern Lauderdale Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 944 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Halls, or 7 miles south of Dyersburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Dyer, Halls, Chestnut Bluff, Bradleytown, Unionville, Eaton, Friendship, Gates, Bishop, Hawkinsville, Grizzard, Fowlkes, Bonicord, Double Bridges, Central, Frog Jump, Rohoboth, Currie and Brazil. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
